name: Wisp Story
description: If we could turn back time and prevent the forest from burning and restore life taken by the evil wisps and their master Masky, we will.. Journey as Wisp in the depths of the enchanted forest and ruins and try to defeat the evils lurking in the dark. Unravel the magic when you defeat Masky McMaskface. Restore what he has destroyed. Repair and restore the nature by defeating the dark forces. This game is a 3D side scroller game, you shoot your orbs by clicking the right mouse button, you move as Wisp using the W,A,S,D keys, and press the spacebar to jump through the obstacles and defeat the enemies.
